response.explain: The previous action code has successfully closed the fridge. Now, we need to freeze the cheese tart.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the oven.
(2) Pick up the plate.
(3) Put the cheese tart on the plate.
(4) Move to the fridge.
(5) Put the plate with the cheese tart inside the fridge.
(6) Close the fridge.
(7) Freeze the cheese tart.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 7: Freeze the cheese tart
    cheese_tart = registry(env,"cheese_tart_85")
    freeze(robot, cheese_tart)
    donothing(env)
